etymology.description: Depicts a hand holding a stick or an ax -> representing authority -> father
etymology.interpretation: The character 父(fù) shows a person holding a stick to symbolize authority, reflecting the traditional role of a father in the family.

examples.chinese: 他的父爱如山(他的父愛如山)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de fù ài rú shān.
examples.english: His father's love is as steady as a mountain.

examples.chinese: 我向父请教(我向父請教)，学到了智慧(學到了智慧)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xiàng fù qǐngjiào, xué dào le zhìhuì.
examples.english: I consulted my father and learned wisdom.

examples.chinese: 古时父训铭刻心灵(古時父訓銘刻心靈)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔ shí fù xùn míngkè xīn líng.
examples.english: In ancient times, a father's teachings were etched into the soul.
